'''''Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees''''' is a [[World Quest]] in [[Gavireh Lajavard]], [[Sumeru]]. It is part of the {{Quest|Pale Fire}}.

==Start Location==
<gallery>
World Quest Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (West Temir Mountains 2) Start Location.png|Start location
World Quest Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (West Temir Mountains 2) Start Location Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Steps==
# Let Sorush awaken the residual Pari in the [[Fravashi Tree]]
# Talk to the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree
# Let Sorush fly alongside the residual Pari
# Talk to the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|The residual Pari residing within the Fravashi Trees are still trapped in obsessions of the past. It seems that Sorush can awaken them...}}
{{Transclude|Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (North Tunigi Hollow 1)|first meet|section=1}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the Fravashi Tree)
:'''Paimon:''' That looks like a Fravashi Tree. Let's go over and have a look!

;(Talk to the Pari)
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' Hey! You're a Pari that I've never met!
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' Would you like to fly with me? Hehe, can you keep up?

;(Talk to the Pari after flying alongside it)
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' That was not bad at all! Looks like there's no monster around that can catch you.
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' Ah, how reliable! That does put my mind at ease.
{{Dialogue End}}
{{Transclude|Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (North Tunigi Hollow 1)|first clear|section=1}}
